H0.text: What was the first British football team to win the European Cup. Liverpool

H1.text: What was the first British football team to win the European Cup. Manchester United

H2.text: What was the first British football team to win the European Cup. Nottingham Forest

H3.text: What was the first British football team to win the European Cup. Celto

A4.text: their most successful period came under the management of Brian Clough and Peter Taylor in the late 1970s and early 1980s, during which they achieved back-to-back European Cup triumphs in 1979 and 1980.
